query: UPDATE blog_posts SET metaDescription = CONCAT(metaDescription, ' Expert tips from professional resume writers with 18+ years experience in Australia.'), updatedAt = NOW() WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) < 120 AND LENGTH(metaDescription) > 0 AND LOWER(title) LIKE '%resume%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute UPDATE blog_posts SET metaDescription = CONCAT(metaDescription, ' Expert tips from professional resume writers with 18+ years experience in Australia.'), updatedAt = NOW() WHERE LENGTH(metaDescription) < 120 AND LENGTH(metaDescription) > 0 AND LOWER(title) LIKE '%resume%';
